name: 阿莱娜·多拉科娃
name_full: 阿莱娜·多拉科娃 Alena Doláková
introduction: Alena portrayed the lead role of troubled dancer Marie in "Mirrors In the Dark" (2021) that opened at Karlovy Vary International Film Festival. In this role, she excelled in three one-shot scenes that lasted 15 minutes and danced in all her scenes. She was also nominated for Czech Critic's Choice Awards.Her breakout role was Holena in the Czech-Danish box office hit "Three Brothers" directed by two-time Academy Award winner Jan Sverak with whom she worked again on the movie "Bethlehem Light" (2022).Alena gained MA at prestigious drama school JAMU and portrayed 10 leading parts in theaters in Prague and the UK. She lived in Los Angeles for two years after which she played an American in several projects. She was part of almost 40 film and TV projects, such as Knightfall (HBO), Whiskey Cavalier (ABC), Haunted (Netflix), Blood Red Sky (Netflix), Last Light (Netflix) playing a Brit, a Bulgarian etc.Miss Dolakova is also a published author (Anna of Hollywood, 2020, Albatros), activist and owner and founder of ANNA Entertainment that brings the female perspective to stories from Eastern Europe and introduces them to Czech and international audience.
